actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to eliminate any penalty for a refusal to answer questions relating to a census of population, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Eliminates the imposition of a penalty for a refusal to answer questions relating to the Federal census of population.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 13, United States Code, to eliminate any penalty for a refusal to answer questions relating to a census of population, and for other purposes.
